characters: Driver of a silver sedan, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban highway. The road is clear with minimal traffic. A silver sedan is seen ahead, gradually moving from the right lane to the center lane. A black car is seen on the right side, initially in the adjacent lane and then moving closer to the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position. The vehicle ahead, a silver sedan, moves from the right lane to the center lane, indicating a lane change. The black car on the right side moves closer to the self-driving vehicle, potentially indicating a cut-in behavior.
key_objects: 1) Front: A silver sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving from the right lane to the center lane. 2) Right: A black car, approximately 5 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicle, potentially indicating a cut-in.

characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A black sedan on the right side is gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle. The white sedan ahead is maintaining a consistent speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and lane position. The black sedan on the right side is overtaking the self-driving vehicle, moving ahead to take the lead position.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed.
